message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You'll get a small share, but I'll give you a chance to negotiate for more!
I'll give you a bigger share, but don't expect a 50/50 split
You'll get a tiny share, but I'm being generous
I'll give you a slightly bigger share, but don't expect a fair deal
You're running out of time, take it or leave it!

I'll give up, you win this time, but I'll be back!
